vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ῥαχήλ, ἡ indecl. (Heb. רָחֵל),
Rachel: Mat.2:18 (LXX).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.29.6;
daughter of: Laban (H3837A);
sister of: Leah (H3812); married to Israel (H3478);
mother of: Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144)
§ Rachel, "ewe"
Rachel, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 2:18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉結 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "雌羊 或 綿羊"
雅各的妻子 (太 2:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉结 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "雌羊 或 绵羊"
雅各的妻子 (太 2:18)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ra-chen «chiên cái». Là con gái út La-ban, là vợ Gia-cốp. Xem H7354.
